item.title: Common Voice for Armenian: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Common Voice Armenia FAQs ðŸ”—What is Common Voice for Armenian? ðŸ”—Common Voice Armenia is a subcommunity of Common Voice , an initiative/project by Mozilla Firefox to help teach machines how people speak. Common Voice invites all languages to join the community provided that contributors follow Mozilla’s playbook. The main moving part of Common Voice is getting people to donate their time and voices to grow their public domain datasets - a collection of multi-lingual voice corpora that is already being used in academia and industry.
